name: patchouli
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Asian bush whose leaves produce a strong-smelling oil: Patchouli grows well in warm and tropical climates. Patchouli is a member of the mint family.
a liquid with a strong, pleasant smell that is made from the leaves of the patchouli plant: I could smell the intoxicating scent of patchouli. I always associate the 1970s with Afghan coats and patchouli.
